Package com.game.main

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
com.game.main.Entity
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable, Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Enemy, Player
public abstract class Entity extends Object implements Runnable, Drawable
Defines dynamic object, with health and damage
